attributes.action: disabled drivers need lower fuel tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the disabled drivers have a very limited income.,but understand the why fuel costs have risen,Can disabled drivers who think with care of our journeys for hospital visits etc have some help with fuel costs so we can stay active?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
